actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that any State which allows motor vehicles displaying a handicapped parking sticker issued by the State to park in specially designated parking spaces should also allow motor vehicles displaying handicapped parking stickers issued by other States to park in those parking spaces.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that States which issue handicapped parking stickers for designated parking spaces should also allow motor vehicles with similar parking stickers issued by other States to park in spaces designated for the handicapped.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that any State which allows motor vehicles displaying a handicapped parking sticker issued by the State to park in specially designated parking spaces should also allow motor vehicles displaying handicapped parking stickers issued by other States to park in those parking spaces.
